name: ticket-assigner
description: Automated ticket assignment system for BGC Engineering IT service desk

scripts.dev: npm run check:env && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run check:env && npm run test:db
